property.value: Human/Curry Bread/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may ask your opponent "Do you love curry bread?". If your opponent says "Love", you may draw 2 cards. Otherwise, this creature gets +10000 power and breaks 2 additional shields.

property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMR-08S Great Miracle: Seven Heroes Version

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that cost 3 or less get "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's evolution creatures and creatures that have "speed attacker" are put into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-08S Great Miracle: Seven Heroes Version

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "Speed attacker". {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water or fire creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone for no cost, put that creature into its owner's mana zone. ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle this card and your graveyard into your deck instead.
